column4: Hi all! I have a problem with kdeTV....can someone lend a helping hand?
:D
I think the card is installed, but there's no picture, and the screen goes black..... ;(
i use tvtime :)
try that:)
Ok, thanks ;)
not that it solves your problem, but tvtime is cool
THANKS CHAMP! It works with no hassle and complicated settings :D:D
I've been banging my head in the wall lately because of these cryptic errormessages I got with kdeTV
I haven't got sound when I use tvtime... tried to change settings, but for no improvement
hold on there's a trick
tvtime page suggest to redirect sound from /dev/dsp1 to /dev/dsp
Thanks m8
sox: command not found
i mean
Ok, but what is sox?
kind of digital recording of dsp1 and streaming to dsp (your soundcard)
and this is something that will go automaticly from now on?
no you need to add it to start script
until it is killed:)
i use screen to run it in background
